tag_professor: GRADED BY FEW THINGS (4)  TEST HEAVY (3)  Tough Grader (2)  Clear grading criteria (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)
stu_tags: CLEAR GRADING CRITERIA  GRADED BY FEW THINGS  TEST HEAVY
comments: Make sure you have the study guides filled out correctly before the exams. Then spend 3-4 hours studying it and it should be an easy A/A-. There is really no reason to go to lecture. I went to almost all and it was very boring and hard to pay attention. Go to section, fill out the study guide(some answers on quizlet), study and you are good to go.

tag_professor: GRADED BY FEW THINGS (4)  TEST HEAVY (3)  Tough Grader (2)  Clear grading criteria (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)
stu_tags: GRADED BY FEW THINGS  LECTURE HEAVY  TEST HEAVY
comments: Marcus and Flannery have a real gift. Unfortunately, it\'s not for teaching. They somehow manage to make incredibly graphic, fascinating topics - human sacrifice! cannibalism! eating guinea pigs! - into the cure for insomnia. If they decided to record audiobooks instead of teach, they could finally solve a mental health issue that impacts millions.

tag_professor: GRADED BY FEW THINGS (4)  TEST HEAVY (3)  Tough Grader (2)  Clear grading criteria (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)
stu_tags: TEST HEAVY  GRADED BY FEW THINGS  TOUGH GRADER
comments: This class is a nightmare! Do not take ever. The profs purposely talk in a monotone voice just to throw you off and then trick you into thinking the multiple choice tests will be easy when they ask questions about irrelevant and obscure details from the lecture. It is impossible to focus in class and the tests are on things that were not covered.

tag_professor: GRADED BY FEW THINGS (4)  TEST HEAVY (3)  Tough Grader (2)  Clear grading criteria (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)
stu_tags: TOUGH GRADER  GRADED BY FEW THINGS  SKIP CLASS? YOU WON\'T PASS.
comments: Do NOT take this class. GSI\'s are rude and unhelpful. A GSI told me a wrong answer to an exam, and that was the difference between 2 letter grades. I spent more time studying for this class than I did for my MCDB classes, yet I got TWO letter grades below. There are NO notes or powerpoints. Each question on an exam is 2% of your grade. AVOID

tag_professor: GRADED BY FEW THINGS (4)  TEST HEAVY (3)  Tough Grader (2)  Clear grading criteria (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)
comments: Easy class. Going to lecture is not necessary, as long as you pay attention in discussion sections and fill out the review sheets when the GSI goes over them. No textbook, no homework, and only 3 exams/quizzes that take 20 minutes to finish.

tag_professor: GRADED BY FEW THINGS (4)  TEST HEAVY (3)  Tough Grader (2)  Clear grading criteria (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)
comments: This is a great class if you\'re interested in meso & south america. Both profs are really nice and experts in the field. Go to lecture in order to do well in the class.

tag_professor: GRADED BY FEW THINGS (4)  TEST HEAVY (3)  Tough Grader (2)  Clear grading criteria (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)
comments: This is the easiest class you will ever take at UM. Seriously. If you take really good notes and try, you\'re worse off. Just look at the study guide before the exam and you\'re guaranteed an A. To those interested in archaeology -- you won\'t learn as much as you\'ll want to but it\'s easy! I definitely recommend this class and both profs are soo nice.

tag_professor: GRADED BY FEW THINGS (4)  TEST HEAVY (3)  Tough Grader (2)  Clear grading criteria (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)
comments: Literally easiest A I have ever taken, and heard anyone else take. Absolute joke, gives the "fill in the blank" study guide that translates into a multiple choice 15 question exam. Attendance not mandatory, and two hours of solid studying before the exam is a guaranteed A. No doubt. TAKE IT

tag_professor: GRADED BY FEW THINGS (4)  TEST HEAVY (3)  Tough Grader (2)  Clear grading criteria (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)
comments: Dr. Marcus was one of the best professors I ever had. She genuinely tries to help students in any way she can, especially with grad school applications. She is a first rate scholar and person.

tag_professor: GRADED BY FEW THINGS (4)  TEST HEAVY (3)  Tough Grader (2)  Clear grading criteria (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)
comments: Very interesting class! Marcus and Flannery are married and co-teach.They\'re super cute. The class has NO TEXTBOOKS, no assignments, just lecture and 3 exams. Each exam is 15 multiple choice questions. Pretty easy and really fun. I\'d recommend to anyone interested in Archaeology or Latin America.
